SEARCH
Package EmailSender

Class Group

java.lang.Object
EmailSender.Group
public class Group extends Object
The Group class represents a group of email recipients. It contains a sender and a list of receivers.

  • Constructor Details

    • Group

      public Group(List<String> recievers)
      Constructs a new Group with the specified list of receivers. The sender is set to the first receiver in the list. If the list of receivers is empty or contains less than 2 email addresses, an error message is printed and the Group.id == -1.
      Parameters:
      recievers - The list of receivers for this group.

  • Method Details

    • getId

      public int getId()

    • getSender

      public String getSender()
      Returns the sender of this group.
      Returns:
      The sender of this group.

    • getReceivers

      public List<String> getReceivers()
      Returns the list of receivers of this group.
      Returns:
      The list of receivers of this group.

    • getStringReceivers

      public String getStringReceivers()
      Returns a string representation of the receivers of this group. The email addresses are formatted as "Firstname Lastname ", and are separated by commas.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the receivers of this group.

    • getStringSender

      public String getStringSender()
      Returns a string representation of the sender of this group. The email address is formatted as "Firstname Lastname ".
      Returns:
      A string representation of the sender of this group.

    • getPersonInfo

      private String getPersonInfo(String email)
      Formats an email address as "Firstname Lastname ". The method extracts the first name and last name from the email address, capitalizes the first letter of each, and then concatenates them with the email address.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address to format.
      Returns:
      The formatted email address.

    • setSender

      public void setSender(String sender)
      Sets the sender of this group.
      Parameters:
      sender - The sender to set.
